23#ifndef _MALLOC_INTERNAL
24#define _MALLOC_INTERNAL
25#include <malloc.h>
26#endif
27
28/* Allocate an array of NMEMB elements each SIZE bytes long.
29 The entire array is initialized to zeros. */
30__ptr_t
31calloc (nmemb, size)
32 register __malloc_size_t nmemb;
33 register __malloc_size_t size;
34{
35 register __ptr_t result = malloc (nmemb * size);
36
37 if (result != NULL)
38 (void) memset (result, 0, nmemb * size);
39
40 return result;
41}
42
